Updated November     pm



On Campus

THIS WEEK This is the last week to catch The Diviners an awardwinning theatrical play about the friendship between a backward 14yearold farm boy and a disillusioned downonhisluck preacher in southern Indiana PERIOD Visit www.fullerton.eduartsevents for show times and tickets PERIOD

TODAY Prof PERIOD Larry Ward will host a screening of the documentary The Lokotas from  to  p.m PERIOD in Heterbrink AB PERIOD

TODAY The environmental studies program will host the  Earth Day Fair from  a.m PERIOD to  p.m PERIOD by the humanities building PERIOD

TODAY The TVFilm Society will present a student film screening in the Titan Theatre  Island from  to  p.m PERIOD with host Prof PERIOD Shelley Jenkins PERIOD

FRIDAY Titan baseball takes on UC Riverside at Goodwin Field at  p.m. on Saturday at  p.m PERIOD and on Sunday at  p.m PERIOD

SATURDAY and SUNDAY Titan softball will take on UC Davis at Anderson field at noon and again at  p.m. and on Sunday at noon PERIOD

Off Campus

SATURDAY The Shipley Nature Center in Huntington Beach will present its first spring festival featuring a continental breakfast international fair California native plant sale and more PERIOD The new Demonstration Gardens will be dedicated at  a.m. and the Fifth Wheel Blue Grass Band will perform at  a.m PERIOD Other activities include a recycling demonstration and a tour of the habitat PERIOD For more information visit www.fsnc.org PERIOD
